alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Johnson; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 2:44AM CST until January 14 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to around 6 inches above 2,500 feet in elevation. At the tops of the mountains snowfall totals of over 1 foot are possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Mountains of east Tennessee. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute Friday. The quick drop in temperatures may lead to freezing of any moisture on roads producing icy roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds could cause some blowing and drifting snow Friday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
